about_the_game:
Embark on a spooky adventure through the realm of the dead!



Ravva and the Netherworld Train is a pixel-art adventure game where you play as Ravva, a young summoner, and their 4 companions! Each has unique powers to overcome obstacles while also giving the player different options to proceed, but that's not all. This time, you can also fuse Ravva with each companion, resulting in whole new creatures to play with! Explore the underworld with many new possibilities!

STORY


In this adventure, young Ravva will need to go further than they've ever been: The Netherworld. After their father goes missing, Ravva follows the clues and finds out that he is lost in the land of the dead! But how do you get there? Why he was taken there? That's something our brave hero will have to find out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB (with Pixel Shadder support)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that works

short_description: Embark on the Netherworld Train with Ravva! Behold a new power to fuse with each of their companions, and explore the dangers of the land of the dead! A cute pixel-art platformer adventure awaits you!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
